title: CliniQuant
enriched_description: CliniQuant is a compact semi-automated biochemistry analyzer for routine clinical chemistry tests. It supports photometric assays, handles common chemistry panels (glucose, urea, creatinine, LFTs), and is suitable for small to medium laboratories requiring reliable throughput with moderate operator interaction.
search_text: CliniQuant semi automated biochemistry analyzer for routine clinical chemistry tests photometric assays glucose urea creatinine LFTs compact analyzer medium labs warranty 2 years reagents 10000 per unit

title: CliniQuant Micro
enriched_description: CliniQuant Micro is a compact, space-saving semi-automated biochemistry analyzer designed for low-to-moderate throughput labs and point-of-care settings. It provides accurate photometric measurements for routine chemistry assays, with simple user interface and small footprint.
search_text: CliniQuant Micro compact semi automated biochemistry analyzer low throughput photometric chemistry analyzer small labs warranty 2 years reagents 10000 per unit
